title: Interesting idea, not sure it's up to the hype.
review: I've seen it twice now, and both times the audience booed at the end. Mostly young kids who probably shouldn't have been allowed in to see it in the first place.  I only felt real fear at 2 points which I won't give away in the film.  I found it more an interesting oddity than a ground breaking film.  Also be aware that if your prone to motion sickness the film might have an effect on you.  I left feeling queasy both times.JRG
